briefdescription.para: Actions are arranged horizontally in the group.
Actions are arranged vertically in the group.
Do not apply margins to widget layout.
Apply standard margins to widget layout.
Describes the widget flags.
The widest label in the group action determines the width for the other labels.
The label width is a percentage of the available width.

detaileddescription.para: The label width is fixed width in pixels

briefdescription.para: Label sizing types (in case of vertical group)
Item alignment.

Whether to show labels or not.

User label width in percentages [0..100].
User label width in pixels.

parameterdescription.para: Widget flags for the configuration of the widget (type)

briefdescription.para: Add stretch action to the group (this will add a stretch to the group layout in the widget)

briefdescription.para: Add action to the group.

briefdescription.para: Remove action from the group.

briefdescription.para: Signals that the label sizing type changed to labelSizingType.

Group action class.

detaileddescription.para: Contains zero or more child actions and either displays them horizontally or vertically.
